title: Touch Me Not
description: When Sukey's son returns from a weekend away with his girlfriend's family, he has a strange request to make. Anita's aunt has become involved with the RYCE (Release Your Cosmic Energy) cult, and her worried family want Sukey and her partner, DI Jim Castle, to investigate. Sukey promises to help, but the project goes on the back burner for the moment -- until a man who has connections with RYCE is discovered dead.
author: Betty Rowlands
